value.title: 14 Tech Specialties That May Soon Be Obsolete

value.title: Microsoft is using ML to help you catch ransomware infections early
value.excerpt: The tool, dubbed Fusion Detection for Ransomware, is the result of collaboration between Azure and the Microsoft Threat Intelligence Center ( MSTIC ), and employs machine learning ( ML) to detect actions typically associated with ransomware activities and alert security teams in time to take remedial action.

value.title: Oracle accelerates MySQL HeatWave queries with machine learning
value.excerpt: MySQL Autopilot uses advanced machine learning techniques to accelerate HeatWave query performance and scalability in Oracle Cloud’s MySQL Database Service.

value.title: Machine learning discovers new sequences to boost drug delivery
value.excerpt: MIT researchers employ machine learning to find powerful peptides that can improve a gene therapy drug for Duchenne muscular dystrophy.

value.title: Modeling Neural Networks on Real Brains Makes ANN Improvement
value.excerpt: A new study shows that artificial intelligence networks based on human brain connectivity can perform cognitive tasks efficiently.

value.title: Social Factors in Machine Learning Models Aid CVD Prediction
value.excerpt: Machine learning approaches are useful for cardiovascular disease prediction, and model performance is improved with inclusion of social determinants of health, according to a review published online July 27 in the American Journal of Preventive Medicine .

value.title: Neural network model shows why people with autism read facial expressions differently
value.excerpt: People with autism spectrum disorder have difficulty interpreting facial expressions. Using a neural network model that reproduces the brain on a computer, a group of researchers based at Tohoku University have unraveled how this comes to be.

value.title: Neural network detects protein-peptide binding sites to kick-start peptide drug discovery
value.excerpt: Two Skoltech researchers have presented a highly efficient neural network model that uses data on the structure of proteins to predict which of their parts interact with other biological molecules called peptides.

value.title: Tesla teases future products using artificial intelligence not related to its electric vehicle fleet
value.excerpt: In the invite to its AI Day, Tesla is teasing the use of artificial intelligence beyond its electric vehicle fleet. What do you think they’re talking about? As we have reported over the last week, Tesla is preparing for its upcoming AI Day on August 19.
